txt.en:
Bolster your fellowship and raid members with a portion of your Innate Strength: Heavy.
<rgb=#FF0000>Requires a Tier 4 Innate Strength: Heavy buff to be present on the Brawler.</rgb>

<rgb=#00FF00>If Specialized as The Fulcrum, all Fellowship and Raid Members within 15m gain: 
Increased Physical and Tactical Mitigation

If specialized as The Maelstrom, all Fellowship and Raid Members within 15m gain:
Increased Critical Rating</rgb>
